tweet: I appeared on the Cardano Effect today:  https://t.co/YZxqCEJyJN around 24:30

Charles Hoskinson (@IOHK_Charles) joined @CardanoEffect and talked about his latest whiteboard video, and shared some updates including transition to mainnet #Shelley, the 'd' parameter, and #SANBA.  Watch the episode here:  https://t.co/MRZud2woOb #CardanoCommunity @InputOutputHK

We've all heard the stories of the early adopters who mined $BTC and how "lucky" they were. Not luck; they put in the effort to learn & mine it when it was only worth pennies. They recognized the potential & wanted change.  We're about to get the same chance staking $ADA.  ₳

The #Byron era slowly ends.  We will enter into the #Shelley era and #Cardano will be a fully decentralized network soon.  We have described the whole process for you based on Charles's video:  https://t.co/dpn8lf59CY  #blockchain #crypto $ADA

I have to tweet this. We wrote an article explaining that #Cardano is not just a wallet. There are many proofs that it is the best project in #crypto. We will see a decentralized main-net soon. Then the article will not be relevant. Everybody will know it.  https://t.co/5jeXf0h08a

During the weekend there was another hack of #DeFi. More than $25M was drained from smart contracts on Uniswap and  https://t.co/BlYBxAUDML.  I really believe that #Cardano will be able to prevent hacks like this. Only a long-term service will gain people's trust.  https://t.co/KxNvndRgG9

@IOHK_Charles We are excited! As soon as Plutus is ready we are prepared to bring automatic formal verification and easy DApp development to #cardano! @IOHK_Charles looking forward to showing you our progress.  https://t.co/BU26I0aUlV

Thanks for the shout-out @Smartereum 🙏  We at @InputOutputHK actually account for more than 800 commits since mid March, not only 383, in all Cardano related repos: cardano-node, ouroboros-network, cardano-ledger-specs, cardano-wallet and daedalus.   https://t.co/5dxczbb95K  #ADA
Nah, I will pass...  I prefer my testnet built in #Rust or #Haskell by the world-class engineers.   #Cardano $ADA #SKY #SKY2
